00034 Image::Image ( ) : set( "indexOrigin", "sequenceNumber,readVec,phaseVec,sliceVec,coilChannelMask,DICOM/EchoNumbers" ), clean( false )
00035 {
00036     addNeededFromString( needed );
00037     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionNumber" );
00038     set.addSecondarySort( "acquisitionTime" );
00039 }
00040 
00041 Image::Image( const isis::data::Image &ref ): set( "", "" )/*SortedChunkList has no default constructor - lets just make an empty (and invalid) set*/
00042 {
00043     ( *this ) = ref; // set will be replaced here anyway
00044 }
00045 
00046 Image &Image::operator=( const isis::data::Image &ref )
00047 {
00048     //deep copy bases
00049     static_cast<util::PropMap &>( *this ) = static_cast<const util::PropMap &>( ref );
00050     static_cast<_internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( *this ) = static_cast<const _internal::NDimensional< 4 >&>( ref );
00051     //deep copy members
00052     chunkVolume = ref.chunkVolume;
00053     clean = ref.clean;
00054     set = ref.set;
00055     //replace all chunks (in set) by cheap copies of them
00056     struct : public _internal::SortedChunkList::chunkPtrOperator {
00057         boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > operator()( const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& ptr ) {
00058             return boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > ( new Chunk( *ptr ) );
00059         }
00060     } replace;
00061     set.transform( replace );
00062     lookup = set.getLookup();
00063     return *this;
00064 }
00065 
00066 
00067 bool Image::checkMakeClean()
00068 {
00069     if ( ! clean ) {
00070         LOG( Debug, info )  << "Image is not clean. Running reIndex ...";
00071 
00072         if( !reIndex() ) {
00073             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Reindexing failed -- undefined behavior ahead ...";
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     return clean;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 bool Image::insertChunk ( const Chunk &chunk )
00082 {
00083     if ( chunk.volume() == 0 ) {
00084         LOG( Runtime, error )
00085                 << "Cannot insert empty Chunk (Size is " << chunk.sizeToString() << ").";
00086         return false;
00087     }
00088 
00089     if ( ! chunk.valid() ) {
00090         LOG( Runtime, error )
00091                 << "Cannot insert invalid chunk. Missing properties: " << chunk.getMissing();
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     LOG_IF( chunk.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" )[3] != 0, Debug, warning )
00096             << " inserting chunk with nonzero at the 4th position - you shouldn't use the fourth dim for the time (use acquisitionTime)";
00097 
00098     if ( set.insert( chunk ) ) {
00099         clean = false;
00100         lookup.clear();
00101         return true;
00102     } else
00103         return false;
00104 }
00105 
00106 
00107 bool Image::reIndex()
00108 {
00109     if ( set.empty() ) {
00110         LOG( Debug, warning ) << "Reindexing an empty image is useless.";
00111         return false;
00112     }
00113 
00114     if( !set.isRectangular() ) {
00115         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "The image is incomplete. Aborting reindex.";
00116         return false;
00117     }
00118 
00119     //redo lookup table
00120     lookup = set.getLookup();
00121     const size_t chunks = lookup.size();
00122     util::FixedVector<size_t, n_dims> size; //storage for the size of the chunk structure
00123     size.fill( 1 );
00124     //get primary attributes from geometrically first chunk - will be usefull
00125     const Chunk &first = chunkAt( 0 );
00126     const unsigned short chunk_dims = first.relevantDims();
00127     chunkVolume = first.volume();
00129     // Determine structure of the image by searching for dimensional breaks in the chunklist
00131     //get indexOrigin from the geometrically first chunk
00132     propertyValue( "indexOrigin" ) = first.propertyValue( "indexOrigin" );
00133     //if there are many chunks, they must leave at least on dimension to the image to "sort" them in
00134     const size_t timesteps = set.getHorizontalSize();
00135     const unsigned short sortDims = n_dims - ( timesteps > 1 ? 1 : 0 ); // dont use the uppermost dim, if the timesteps are already there
00136 
00137     if ( chunk_dims >= Image::n_dims ) {
00138         if ( lookup.size() > 1 ) {
00139             LOG( Runtime, error )
00140                     << "Cannot handle multiple Chunks, if they have more than "
00141                     << Image::n_dims - 1 << " dimensions";
00142             return false;
00143         }
00144 
00145         //if there is only one chunk, its ok - the image will consist only of this one,
00146         //and commonGet will allways return <0,set.begin()->dim2Index()>
00147         //thus in this case voxel() equals set.begin()->voxel()
00148     } else {// OK there is at least one dimension to sort in the chunks
00149         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computing strides for dimensions " << util::MSubject( chunk_dims + 1 ) << " to " << util::MSubject( sortDims );
00150 
00151         // check the chunks for at least one dimensional break - use that for the size of that dimension
00152         for ( unsigned short i = chunk_dims; i < sortDims; i++ ) { //if there are dimensions left figure out their size
00153             size[i] = getChunkStride( size.product() ) / size.product();
00154             assert( size[i] != 0 );
00155         }
00156     }
00157 
00158     if ( sortDims < n_dims ) { //if there is a timedim (not all dims was used for geometric sort)
00159         assert( size[sortDims] == 1 );
00160         size[sortDims] = timesteps; // fill the dim above the top geometric dim with the timesteps
00161     }
00162 
00163     assert( size.product() == lookup.size() );
00164     //Clean up the properties
00165     //@todo might fail if the image contains a prop that differs to that in the Chunks (which is equal in the chunks)
00166     util::PropMap common;
00167     util::PropMap::key_list uniques;
00168     first.toCommonUnique( common, uniques, true );
00169 
00170     for ( size_t i = 1; i < chunks; i++ ) {
00171         chunkAt( i ).toCommonUnique( common, uniques, false );
00172     }
00173 
00174     LOG( Debug, info ) << uniques.size() << " Chunk-unique properties found in the Image";
00175     LOG_IF( uniques.size(), Debug, verbose_info ) << util::list2string( uniques.begin(), uniques.end(), ", " );
00176     join( common );
00177     LOG_IF( ! common.empty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties saved into the image " << common;
00178 
00179     //remove common props from the chunks
00180     for ( size_t i = 0; i != lookup.size(); i++ )
00181         chunkAt( i ).remove( common, false ); //this _won't keep needed properties - so from here on the chunks of the image are invalid
00182 
00183     LOG_IF( ! common.empty(), Debug, verbose_info ) << "common properties removed from " << chunks << " chunks: " << common;
00184 
00185     // add the chunk-size to the image-size
00186     for ( unsigned short i = 0; i < chunk_dims; i++ )
00187         size[i] = first.dimSize( i );
00188 
00189     init( size ); // set size of the image
00191     //reconstruct some redundant information, if its missing
00193     const util::PropMap::pname_type vectors[] = {"readVec", "phaseVec", "sliceVec"};
00194     BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropMap::pname_type & ref, vectors ) {
00195         if ( hasProperty( ref ) ) {
00196             util::PropertyValue &prop = propertyValue( ref );
00197             LOG_IF( !prop->is<util::fvector4>(), Debug, error ) << "Using " << prop->typeName() << " as " << util::Type<util::fvector4>::staticName();
00198             util::fvector4 &vec = prop->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00199             LOG_IF( vec.len() == 0, Runtime, error )
00200                     << "The existing " << ref << " " << vec << " has the length zero. Thats bad, because I'm going to normalize it.";
00201             vec.norm();
00202         }
00203     }
00204 
00205     //if we have at least two slides (and have slides (with different positions) at all)
00206     if ( chunk_dims == 2 && size[2] > 1 && first.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00207         const util::fvector4 thisV = first.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00208         const Chunk &last = chunkAt( size[2] - 1 );
00209 
00210         if ( last.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00211             const util::fvector4 lastV = last.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00212             //check the slice vector
00213             util::fvector4 distVecNorm = lastV - thisV;
00214             LOG_IF( distVecNorm.len() == 0, Runtime, error )
00215                     << "The distance between the the first and the last chunk is zero. Thats bad, because I'm going to normalize it.";
00216             distVecNorm.norm();
00217 
00218             if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00219                 const util::fvector4 sliceVec = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "sliceVec" );
00220                 LOG_IF( ! distVecNorm.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec ), Runtime, warning )
00221                         << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00222                         << " differs from the distance vector between chunk 0 and " << size[2] - 1
00223                         << " " << distVecNorm;
00224             } else {
00225                 LOG( Debug, info )
00226                         << "used the distance between chunk 0 and " << size[2] - 1
00227                         << " to synthesize the missing sliceVec as " << distVecNorm;
00228                 propertyValue( "sliceVec" ) = distVecNorm;
00229             }
00230         }
00231 
00232         const util::fvector4 &voxeSize = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" );
00233 
00234         const Chunk &next = chunkAt( 1 );
00235 
00236         if ( next.hasProperty( "indexOrigin" ) ) {
00237             const util::fvector4 nextV = next.getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00238             const float sliceDist = ( nextV - thisV ).len() - voxeSize[2];
00239 
00240             if ( sliceDist > 0 ) {
00241                 const float inf = std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity();
00242 
00243                 if ( ! hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) { // @todo check this
00244                     setProperty( "voxelGap", util::fvector4( 0, 0, inf, 0 ) );
00245                 }
00246 
00247                 util::fvector4 &voxelGap = propertyValue( "voxelGap" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>(); //if there is no voxelGap yet, we create it
00248 
00249                 if ( voxelGap[2] != inf ) {
00250                     if ( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist, 50 ) ) {
00251                         LOG_IF( ! util::fuzzyEqual( voxelGap[2], sliceDist, 50 ), Runtime, warning )
00252                                 << "The existing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) " << util::MSubject( voxelGap[2] )
00253                                 << " differs from the distance between chunk 0 and 1, which is " << sliceDist;
00254                     }
00255                 } else {
00256                     voxelGap[2] = sliceDist;
00257                     LOG( Debug, info )
00258                             << "used the distance between chunk 0 and 1 to synthesize the missing slice distance (voxelGap[2]) as "
00259                             << sliceDist;
00260                 }
00261             }
00262         }
00263     }
00264 
00265     //if we have read- and phase- vector
00266     if ( hasProperty( "readVec" ) && hasProperty( "phaseVec" ) ) {
00267         util::fvector4 &read = propertyValue( "readVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00268         util::fvector4 &phase = propertyValue( "phaseVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00269         LOG_IF( read.dot( phase ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00270         const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4( //we could use their cross-product as sliceVector
00271                                             read[1] * phase[2] - read[2] * phase[1],
00272                                             read[2] * phase[0] - read[0] * phase[2],
00273                                             read[0] * phase[1] - read[1] * phase[0]
00274                                         );
00275 
00276         if ( hasProperty( "sliceVec" ) ) {
00277             util::fvector4 &sliceVec = propertyValue( "sliceVec" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>(); //get the slice vector
00278             LOG_IF( ! crossVec.fuzzyEqual( sliceVec, 1000 ), Runtime, warning )
00279                     << "The existing sliceVec " << sliceVec
00280                     << " differs from the cross product of the read- and phase vector " << crossVec;
00281         } else {
00282             // We dont know anything about the slice-direction
00283             // we just guess its along the positive cross-product between read- and phase direction
00284             // so at least warn the user if we do that long shot
00285             LOG( Runtime, warning )
00286                     << "used the cross product between readVec and phaseVec as sliceVec:"
00287                     << crossVec << ". That might be wrong!";
00288             setProperty( "sliceVec", crossVec );
00289         }
00290     }
00291 
00292     if ( hasProperty( "fov" ) ) {
00293         util::fvector4 &propFoV = propertyValue( "fov" )->cast_to<util::fvector4>();
00294         util::fvector4 voxelGap;
00295 
00296         if ( hasProperty( "voxelGap" ) ) {
00297             voxelGap = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "voxelGap" );
00298 
00299             for ( size_t i = 0; i < n_dims; i++ )
00300                 if ( voxelGap[i] == -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00301                     LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Ignoring unknown voxel gap in direction " << i;
00302                     voxelGap[i] = 0;
00303                 }
00304         }
00305 
00306         const util::fvector4 &calcFoV = getFoV( getProperty<util::fvector4>( "voxelSize" ), voxelGap );
00307 
00308         bool ok = true;
00309 
00310         for ( size_t i = 0; i < n_dims; i++ ) {
00311             if ( propFoV[i] != -std::numeric_limits<float>::infinity() ) {
00312                 ok &= util::fuzzyEqual( propFoV[i], calcFoV[i] );
00313             } else
00314                 propFoV[i] = calcFoV[i];
00315         }
00316 
00317         LOG_IF( ! ok, Runtime, warning )
00318                 << "The calculated field of view differs from the stored " << propFoV << "/" << calcFoV;
00319     }
00320 
00321     LOG_IF( ! valid(), Runtime, warning ) << "The image is not valid after reindexing. Missing properties: " << getMissing();
00322     return clean = valid();
00323 }
00324 bool Image::empty()const
00325 {
00326     return set.empty();
00327 }
00328 
00329 const boost::shared_ptr< Chunk >& Image::chunkPtrAt( size_t at )const
00330 {
00331     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "The lookup table is empty. Run reIndex first.";
00332     LOG_IF( at >= lookup.size(), Debug, error ) << "Index is out of the range of the lookup table (" << at << ">=" << lookup.size() << ").";
00333     const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ptr = lookup[at];
00334     LOG_IF( !ptr, Debug, error ) << "There is no chunk at " << at << ". This usually happens in incomplete images.";
00335     return ptr;
00336 }

00338 Chunk Image::getChunkAt( size_t at, bool copy_metadata )const
00339 {
00340     Chunk ret( *chunkPtrAt( at ) );
00341 
00342     if( copy_metadata )ret.join( *this ); // copy all metadata from the image in here
00343 
00344     return ret;
00345 }
00346 Chunk &Image::chunkAt( size_t at )
00347 {
00348     return *chunkPtrAt( at );
00349 }

00352 {

00354     return const_cast<const Image &>( *this ).getChunk( first, second, third, fourth, copy_metadata ); // use the const version

00357 const Chunk Image::getChunk ( size_t first, size_t second, size_t third, size_t fourth, bool copy_metadata ) const
00358 {
00359     const size_t index = commonGet( first, second, third, fourth ).first;
00360     return getChunkAt( index, copy_metadata );
00361 }
00362 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr< Chunk > > Image::getChunkList()

00364     checkMakeClean();//lookup is filled by reIndex
00365     return lookup;
00366 }

00368 std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk > > Image::getChunkList()const
00369 {
00370     LOG_IF( !clean, Debug, error ) << "You shouldn't do this on a non clean image. Run reIndex first.";
00371     return std::vector< boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk > >( lookup.begin(), lookup.end() );
00372 }
00373 
00374 
00375 size_t Image::getChunkStride ( size_t base_stride )
00376 {
00377     LOG_IF( set.empty(), Runtime, error ) << "Trying to get chunk stride in an empty image";
00378     LOG_IF( lookup.empty(), Debug, error ) << "Lookup table for chunks is empty. Do reIndex() first!";
00379 
00380     if ( lookup.size() >= 4 * base_stride ) {
00381         /* there can't be any stride with less than 3*base_stride chunks (which would actually be an invalid image)
00382          * _____
00383          * |c c| has no stride/dimensional break
00384          * _____
00385          * |c c|
00386          * |c  | has a dimensional break, but is invalid
00387          * _____
00388          * |c c|
00389          * |c c| is the first reasonable case
00390          */
00391         // get the distance between first and second chunk for comparision
00392         const util::fvector4 firstV = chunkAt( 0 ).getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00393         const util::fvector4 nextV = chunkAt( base_stride ).getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00394         const util::fvector4 dist1 = nextV - firstV;
00395 
00396         if( dist1.sqlen() == 0 ) { //if there is no geometric structure anymore - so asume its flat from here on
00397             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( base_stride )
00398                                << " is zero. Assuming there are no dimensional breaks anymore. Returning " << util::MSubject( base_stride );
00399             return base_stride;
00400         } else for ( size_t i = base_stride; i < lookup.size() - base_stride; i += base_stride ) {  // compare every follwing distance to that
00401                 const util::fvector4 thisV = chunkAt( i ).getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00402                 const util::fvector4 nextV = chunkAt( i + base_stride ).getProperty<util::fvector4>( "indexOrigin" );
00403                 const util::fvector4 distFirst = nextV - firstV;
00404                 const util::fvector4 distThis = nextV - thisV;
00405                 LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00406                         << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i ) << " and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00407                         << " is " << distThis.len() << ". Distance between 0 and " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride ) << " is " << distFirst.len();
00408 
00409                 if ( distFirst.sqlen() <= distThis.sqlen() ) { // the next chunk is nearer to the begin than to this => dimensional break => leave
00410                     LOG( Debug, info )
00411                             << "Distance between chunk " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00412                             << " and 0 is not bigger than the distance between " << util::MSubject( i + base_stride )
00413                             << " and " << util::MSubject( i ) << ", assuming dimensional break at " << i + base_stride;
00414                     return i + base_stride;
00415                 }
00416             }
00417     } else  if ( lookup.size() % base_stride ) {
00418         LOG( Runtime, error )
00419                 << "The amount of chunks (" << lookup.size()
00420                 << ") is not divisible by the block size of the dimension below (" << base_stride
00421                 << "). Maybe the image is incomplete.";
00422         LOG( Runtime, warning )
00423                 << "Ignoring "  <<  lookup.size() % base_stride << " chunks.";
00424         return lookup.size() - ( lookup.size() % base_stride );
00425     }
00426 
00427     //we didn't find any break, so we assume its a linear image |c c ... c|
00428     LOG( Debug, info )
00429             << "No dimensional break found, assuming it to be at the end (" << lookup.size() << "/" << set.getHorizontalSize() << ")";
00430     return lookup.size() / set.getHorizontalSize();
00431 }
00432 
00433 std::list<util::PropertyValue> Image::getChunksProperties( const util::PropMap::pname_type &key, bool unique )const
00434 {
00435     std::list<util::PropertyValue > ret;
00436 
00437     if( clean ) {
00438         BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00439             const util::PropertyValue &prop = ref->propertyValue( key );
00440 
00441             if ( unique && prop.empty() ) //if unique is requested and the property is empty
00442                 continue; //skip it
00443             else if ( unique && !( ret.empty() ||  prop == ret.back() ) )
00444                 //if unique is requested and the property is equal to the one added before
00445                 continue;//skip it
00446             else
00447                 ret.push_back( prop );
00448         }
00449     } else {
00450         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Cannot get chunk-properties from non clean images. Run reIndex first";
00451     }
00452 
00453     return ret;
00454 }
00455 
00456 size_t Image::bytes_per_voxel() const
00457 {
00458     size_t size = chunkPtrAt( 0 )->bytes_per_voxel();
00459     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00460         LOG_IF( size != ref->bytes_per_voxel(), Debug, warning )
00461                 << "Not all voxels have the same byte size (" << size << "!=" << ref->bytes_per_voxel() << "). Using the biggest.";
00462 
00463         if( size < ref->bytes_per_voxel() ) {
00464             size = ref->bytes_per_voxel();
00465         }
00466     }
00467     return size;
00468 }
00469 
00470 ImageList::ImageList() {}
00471 ImageList::ImageList( ChunkList src )
00472 {
00473     for ( ChunkList::iterator i = src.begin(); i != src.end(); ) {
00474         if ( ! ( *i )->valid() ) { // drop invalid chunks
00475             LOG( Runtime, error )
00476                     << "Ignoring invalid chunk. Missing properties: " << ( *i )->getMissing();
00477             src.erase( i++ );
00478         } else
00479             i++;
00480     }
00481 
00482     size_t errcnt = 0;
00483 
00484     while ( !src.empty() ) {
00485         LOG( Debug, info ) << src.size() << " Chunks left to be distributed.";
00486         value_type buff( new Image );
00487         size_t cnt = 0;
00488 
00489         for ( ChunkList::iterator i = src.begin(); i != src.end(); ) { // for all remaining chunks
00490             if ( buff->insertChunk( **i ) ) {
00491                 src.erase( i++ );
00492                 cnt++;
00493             } else
00494                 i++;
00495         }
00496 
00497         if ( !buff->empty() ) {
00498             LOG( Debug, info ) << "Reindexing image with " << cnt << " chunks.";
00499 
00500             if ( buff->reIndex() ) {
00501                 if ( buff->valid() ) {
00502                     push_back( buff );
00503                     util::TypeReference min, max;
00504                     buff->getMinMax( min, max );
00505                     LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Image " << size() << " with size " << buff->sizeToString() <<  " and value range " << min << " to " << max << " done.";
00506                 } else {
00507                     LOG( Runtime, error )
00508                             << "Cannot insert image. Missing properties: " << buff->getMissing();
00509                     errcnt += cnt;
00510                 }
00511             } else {
00512                 LOG( Runtime, info ) << "Skipping broken image.";
00513                 errcnt += cnt;
00514             }
00515         }
00516     }
00517 
00518     LOG_IF( errcnt, Runtime, warning ) << "Dropped " << errcnt << " chunks because they didn't form valid images";
00519 }
00520 
00521 void Image::getMinMax ( util::TypeReference &min, util::TypeReference &max ) const
00522 {
00523     LOG_IF( ! min.empty(), Debug, warning ) << "Running getMinMax using non empty min. It will be reset.";
00524     LOG_IF( ! max.empty(), Debug, warning ) << "Running getMinMax using non empty max. It will be reset.";
00525     min = util::TypeReference();
00526     max = util::TypeReference();
00527     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00528         ref->getMinMax( min, max );
00529     }
00530 }
00531 
00532 std::pair< util::TypeReference, util::TypeReference > Image::getScalingTo( short unsigned int targetID, autoscaleOption scaleopt ) const
00533 {
00534     LOG_IF( !clean, Runtime, error ) << "You should run reIndex before running this";
00535     util::TypeReference min, max;
00536     getMinMax( min, max );
00537     bool unique = true;
00538     const std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk> > chunks = getChunkList();
00539     BOOST_FOREACH( const boost::shared_ptr<const Chunk> &ref, chunks ) { //find a chunk which would be converted
00540         if( targetID != ref->typeID() ) {
00541             LOG_IF( ref->getScalingTo( targetID, *min, *max, scaleopt ).first.empty() || ref->getScalingTo( targetID, *min, *max, scaleopt ).second.empty(), Debug, error )
00542                     << "Returning an invalid scaling. This is bad!";
00543             return ref->getScalingTo( targetID, *min, *max, scaleopt ); // and ask that for the scaling
00544         }
00545     }
00546     return std::make_pair( //ok seems like no conversion is needed - return 1/0
00547                util::TypeReference( util::Type<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00548                util::TypeReference( util::Type<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00549            );
00550 }
00551 
00552 size_t Image::cmp( const isis::data::Image &comp ) const
00553 {
00554     size_t ret = 0;
00555     LOG_IF( ! ( clean && comp.clean ), Debug, error )
00556             << "Comparing unindexed images will cause you trouble, run reIndex()!";
00557 
00558     if ( sizeToVector() != comp.sizeToVector() ) {
00559         LOG( Runtime, warning ) << "Size of images differs (" << sizeToVector() << "/"
00560                                 << comp.sizeToVector() << "). Adding difference to the result.";
00561         ret += ( sizeToVector() - comp.sizeToVector() ).product();
00562     }
00563 
00564     util::ivector4 compVect( util::minVector( chunkPtrAt( 0 )->sizeToVector(), comp.chunkPtrAt( 0 )->sizeToVector() ) );
00565     util::ivector4 start;
00566     const size_t increment = compVect.product();
00567 
00568     for ( size_t i = 0; i < volume(); i += increment ) {
00569         const size_t nexti = i + increment - 1;
00570         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair1( i / chunkVolume, i % chunkVolume );
00571         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c1pair2( nexti / chunkVolume, nexti % chunkVolume );
00572         const std::pair<size_t, size_t> c2pair1( i / comp.chunkVolume, i % comp.chunkVolume );
00573         assert( c1pair1.first == c1pair2.first );
00574         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Comparing chunks at " << c1pair1.first << " and "   << c2pair1.first;
00575         const Chunk &c1 = *chunkPtrAt( c1pair1.first );
00576         const Chunk &c2 = *( comp.chunkPtrAt( c2pair1.first ) );
00577         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00578                 << "Start positions are " << c1pair1.second << " and " << c2pair1.second
00579                 << " and the length is " << c1pair2.second - c1pair1.second;
00580         ret += c1.cmpRange( c1pair1.second, c1pair2.second, c2, c2pair1.second );
00581     }
00582 
00583     return ret;
00584 }
00585 
00586 Image::orientation Image::getMainOrientation()const
00587 {
00588     LOG_IF( ! valid() || ! clean, Debug, warning ) << "You should not run this on non clean image. Run reIndex first.";
00589     util::fvector4 read = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "readVec" );
00590     util::fvector4 phase = getProperty<util::fvector4>( "phaseVec" );
00591     read.norm();
00592     phase.norm();
00593     LOG_IF( read.dot( phase ) > 0.01, Runtime, warning ) << "The cosine between the columns and the rows of the image is bigger than 0.01";
00594     const util::fvector4 crossVec = util::fvector4(
00595                                         read[1] * phase[2] - read[2] * phase[1],
00596                                         read[2] * phase[0] - read[0] * phase[2],
00597                                         read[0] * phase[1] - read[1] * phase[0]
00598                                     );
00599     const util::fvector4 x( 1, 0 ), y( 0, 1 ), z( 0, 0, 1 );
00600     double a_axial    = std::acos( crossVec.dot( z ) ) / M_PI;
00601     double a_sagittal = std::acos( crossVec.dot( x ) ) / M_PI;
00602     double a_coronal  = std::acos( crossVec.dot( y ) ) / M_PI;
00603     bool a_inverse = false, s_inverse = false, c_inverse = false;
00604     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Angles to vectors are " << a_sagittal << " to x, " << a_coronal << " to y and " << a_axial << " to z";
00605 
00606     if( a_axial > .5 ) {
00607         a_axial = std::abs( a_axial - 1 );
00608         a_inverse = true;
00609     }
00610 
00611     if( a_sagittal > .5 ) {
00612         a_sagittal = std::abs( a_sagittal - 1 );
00613         s_inverse = true;
00614     }
00615 
00616     if( a_coronal > .5 ) {
00617         a_coronal = std::abs( a_coronal - 1 );
00618         c_inverse = true;
00619     }
00620 
00621     if( a_axial <= .25 )
00622         return a_inverse ? reversed_axial : axial;
00623     else if( a_sagittal <= .25 )
00624         return s_inverse ? reversed_sagittal : sagittal;
00625     else if( a_coronal <= .25 )
00626         return c_inverse ? reversed_coronal : coronal;
00627     else
00628         assert( false );
00629 
00630     return axial; //will never be reached
00631 }
00632 
00633 unsigned short Image::typeID() const
00634 {
00635     unsigned int mytypeID = chunkPtrAt( 0 )->typeID();
00636     size_t tmpBytesPerVoxel = 0;
00637     util::TypeReference min, max;
00638     getMinMax( min, max );
00639     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Determining  datatype of image with the value range " << min << " to " << max;
00640 
00641     if( min->typeID() == max->typeID() ) { // ok min and max are the same type - trivial case
00642         return min->typeID() << 8; // btw: we do the shift, because min and max are Type - but we want the id's TypePtr
00643     } else if( min->fitsInto( max->typeID() ) ) { // if min fits into the type of max, use that
00644         return max->typeID() << 8; //@todo maybe use a global static function here instead of a obscure shit operation
00645     } else if( max->fitsInto( min->typeID() ) ) { // if max fits into the type of min, use that
00646         return min->typeID() << 8;
00647     } else {
00648         LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Sorry I dont know which datatype I should use. (" << min->typeName() << " or " << max->typeName() << ")";
00649         throw( std::logic_error( "type selection failed" ) );
00650         return std::numeric_limits<unsigned char>::max();
00651     }
00652 }
00653 std::string Image::typeName() const
00654 {
00655     return util::getTypeMap()[typeID()];
00656 }
00657 
00658 bool Image::makeOfTypeId( short unsigned int id )
00659 {
00660     // get value range of the image for the conversion
00661     scaling_pair scale = getScalingTo( id );
00662     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Computed scaling of the original image data: [" << scale << "]";
00663     bool retVal = true;
00664     //we want all chunks to be of type id - so tell them
00665     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, lookup ) {
00666         retVal &= ref->makeOfTypeId( id, scale );
00667     }
00668     return retVal;
00669 }
00670 
00671 size_t Image::spliceDownTo( dimensions dim ) //readDim = 0, phaseDim, sliceDim, timeDim
00672 {
00673     if( lookup[0]->relevantDims() < ( size_t ) dim ) {
00674         LOG( Debug, error ) << "The dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already below " << dim << " cannot splice it.";
00675         return 0;
00676     } else if( lookup[0]->relevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim ) {
00677         LOG( Debug, info ) << "Skipping useless splicing, relevantDims is allready " << lookup[0]->relevantDims();
00678         return lookup.size();
00679     }
00680 
00681     LOG_IF( lookup[0]->relevantDims() == ( size_t ) dim, Debug, info ) << "Running useless splice, the dimensionality of the chunks of this image is already " << dim;
00682     LOG_IF( hasProperty( "acquisitionTime" ) || lookup[0]->hasProperty( "acquisitionTime" ), Debug, warning ) << "Splicing images with acquisitionTime will cause you lots of trouble. You should remove that before.";
00683     util::FixedVector<size_t, 4> size = sizeToVector();
00684 
00685     for( int i = 0; i < dim; i++ )
00686         size[i] = 1;
00687 
00688     // get a list of needed properties (everything which is missing in a newly created chunk plus everything which is needed for autosplice)
00689     const std::list<util::PropMap::pname_type> splice_needed = util::string2list<util::PropMap::pname_type>( util::PropMap::pname_type( "voxelSize,voxelGap,readVec,phaseVec,sliceVec,indexOrigin,acquisitionNumber" ), ',' );
00690     util::PropMap::key_list needed = MemChunk<short>( 1 ).getMissing();
00691     needed.insert( splice_needed.begin(), splice_needed.end() );
00692     struct splicer {
00693         dimensions m_dim;
00694         Image &m_image;
00695         size_t m_amount;
00696         splicer( dimensions dim, size_t amount, Image &image ): m_dim( dim ), m_image( image ), m_amount( amount ) {}
00697         void operator()( const Chunk &ch ) {
00698             const size_t topDim = ch.relevantDims() - 1;
00699 
00700             if( topDim >= ( size_t ) m_dim ) { // ok we still have to splice that
00701                 const size_t subSize = m_image.sizeToVector()[topDim];
00702                 assert( !( m_amount % subSize ) ); // there must not be any "remaining"
00703                 splicer sub( m_dim, m_amount / subSize, m_image );
00704                 BOOST_FOREACH( ChunkList::const_reference ref, ch.autoSplice( m_amount / subSize ) ) {
00705                     sub( *ref );
00706                 }
00707             } else { // seems like we're done - insert it into the image
00708                 assert( ch.relevantDims() == ( size_t ) m_dim ); // index of the higest dim>1 (ch.relevantDims()-1) shall be equal to the dim below the requested splicing (m_dim-1)
00709                 m_image.insertChunk( ch );
00710             }
00711         }
00712     };
00713     std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> > buffer = lookup; // store the old lookup table
00714     lookup.clear();
00715     set.clear(); // clear the image, so we can insert the splices
00716     //static_cast<util::PropMap::base_type*>(this)->clear(); we can keep the common properties - they will be merged with thier own copies from the chunks on the next reIndex
00717     splicer splice( dim, size.product(), *this );
00718     BOOST_FOREACH( boost::shared_ptr<Chunk> &ref, buffer ) {
00719         BOOST_FOREACH( const util::PropMap::pname_type & need, needed ) { //get back properties needed for the
00720             if( !ref->hasProperty( need ) && this->hasProperty( need ) ) {
00721                 ref->propertyValue( need ) = this->propertyValue( need );
00722             }
00723         }
00724         splice( *ref );
00725     }
00726     reIndex();
00727     return lookup.size();
00728 }
